snippet: The giant software company is creating four new divisions and reassigning nearly every senior executive as it tries to create timely products that consumers want.
abstract: Microsoft announces ambitious overhaul under which it will dissolve eight product divisions in favor of four new ones arranged around broader functional themes; shift will involve reassigning nearly every senior executive in effort to create timely products that consumers want; new system will resemble corporate strategy that has long benefited Apple.

byline.contributor: Claire Cain Miller contributed reporting from San Francisco.

lead_paragraph: The giant software company is creating four new divisions and reassigning nearly every senior executive as it tries to create timely products that consumers want.
